to face is that even within a tenant that distribution may not be the same across tables so here I've got two

instances as managing and storing my data what I'm gonna find is that if I'm

and that I might have to now go change the size of that instance because I didn't distribute those tenants appropriate lacrosse appropriate
lacrosse excuse me appropriately across the instances so we can get this sort of

this is charting the shards right so typically we would just say hey if I'm
indexing data here that I would just say throw the tenant ID and as the the key
